Song.title: God Delights In You
Song.copyright: Music by George Romanacce Words by Eric Grover © 2009 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D | A/C# | Bm7 | Asus]
Verse 1: [D] Calling every daughter,{,}[A/C#] [ ]calling every son [Bm7] All who’ve been adopted,[Asus] [ ]through a sacrifice of l[G2]ove There’s no [Asus]need for you to [Bm]fear, Your [Asus]debts have all been cleared
Verse 2: [D] Calling all the downcast,[A/C#] [ ]who feel like they’re alone [Bm7] Anyone who’s longing{,}[Asus] for a family of their [G2]own God’s pre[Asus]pared a place for [Bm]you, He’s [Asus]calling you to
Chorus: [G2] Come and [D]sing, come and [A/C#]dance [Bm7] The [G2]Father’s [D]singing over [Asus]you [G2] Come re[D]joice and be [A/C#]glad [Bm7] For [G2]God de[D]lights in [Asus]you, in [D]you [| A/C# | Bm7 | Asus]
Verse 3: [D] Calling all who’ve wandered[A/C#],{,} [ ]gone off on their own [Bm7] Anyone who wonders{,}[Asus] if they’re welcome back at [G2]home The God of [Asus]grace makes all things [Bm]new, He’s [Asus]calling you to
{new_page} Bridge: [Em7] You chose us[D] [ ]to be the [A/C#]objects of Your [Bm7 A]love [G2] In spite of[D] [ ]all we have [A/C# A]done [Em7] You gave Your[D] [ ]beloved [A/C#]Son to die for [Bm7 A]us [G2] To make us[D] [ ]daughters and [A]sons
{key:E} Chorus: [A2] Come and [E]sing, come and [B/D#]dance [C#m7] The [A2]Father’s [E]singing over [Bsus]you [A2] Come re[E]joice and be [B/D#]glad [C#m7] For [A2]God de[E]lights in [Bsus]you, in [E]you [| B/D# | C#m7 | Bsus]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 calling every daughter calling every son all whove been adopted through a sacrifice of love theres no need for you to fear your debts have all been cleared verse 2 calling all the downcast who feel like theyre alone anyone whos longing for a family of their own gods prepared a place for you hes calling you to chorus come and sing come and dance the fathers singing over you come rejoice and be glad for god delights in you in you verse 3 calling all whove wandered gone off on their own anyone who wonders if theyre welcome back at home the god of grace makes all things new hes calling you to bridge you chose us to be the objects of your love in spite of all we have done you gave your beloved son to die for us to make us daughters and sons chorus come and sing come and dance the fathers singing over you come rejoice and be glad for god delights in you in you

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [G | D/F# | Em7 | Dsus]
Verse 1: [G] Calling every daughter,{,}[D/F#] [ ]calling every son [Em7] All who’ve been adopted,[Dsus] [ ]through a sacrifice of l[C2]ove There’s no [Dsus]need for you to [Em]fear, Your [Dsus]debts have all been cleared
Verse 2: [G] Calling all the downcast,[D/F#] [ ]who feel like they’re alone [Em7] Anyone who’s longing{,}[Dsus] for a family of their [C2]own God’s pre[Dsus]pared a place for [Em]you, He’s [Dsus]calling you to
Chorus: [C2] Come and [G]sing, come and [D/F#]dance [Em7] The [C2]Father’s [G]singing over [Dsus]you [C2] Come re[G]joice and be [D/F#]glad [Em7] For [C2]God de[G]lights in [Dsus]you, in [G]you [| D/F# | Em7 | Dsus]
Verse 3: [G] Calling all who’ve wandered[D/F#],{,} [ ]gone off on their own [Em7] Anyone who wonders{,}[Dsus] if they’re welcome back at [C2]home The God of [Dsus]grace makes all things [Em]new, He’s [Dsus]calling you to
Bridge: [Am7] You chose us[G] [ ]to be the [D/F#]objects of Your [Em7 D]love [C2] In spite of[G] [ ]all we have [D/F# D]done [Am7] You gave Your[G] [ ]beloved [D/F#]Son to die for [Em7 D]us [C2] To make us[G] [ ]daughters and [D]sons
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 calling every daughter calling every son all whove been adopted through a sacrifice of love theres no need for you to fear your debts have all been cleared verse 2 calling all the downcast who feel like theyre alone anyone whos longing for a family of their own gods prepared a place for you hes calling you to chorus come and sing come and dance the fathers singing over you come rejoice and be glad for god delights in you in you verse 3 calling all whove wandered gone off on their own anyone who wonders if theyre welcome back at home the god of grace makes all things new hes calling you to bridge you chose us to be the objects of your love in spite of all we have done you gave your beloved son to die for us to make us daughters and sons
